snippet.title: Launch Trailer! - Plants vs. Zombies 2: Reflourished
snippet.description:
What if PvZ2 didn't end at Modern Day? What if it kept getting new worlds, what if it just.. kept going? That's the question PvZ2: Reflourished wants to answer! PvZ2: Reflourished is a casual-oriented mod with new worlds in the full PopCap style, with new music, art, bosses and more! Alongside new worlds, Reflourished brings along brand-new extra challenging expansion levels for the original worlds, intended for those of whom want to take on more challenging content. To really sweeten the deal, Reflourished comes with Pinata Parties and Inzanity quests, which are sure to provide you with plenty to look out for even once you finish the main content.

Animation by @aaron5015 and Gira
Video edited by @Petrifying 

PvZ2: Reflourished Download Link: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1y5lVZh-flKWxpeXSFYJprzJlL4Jlcfm4?usp=sharing
(MEGA Mirror): https://mega.nz/folder/yHxTTbhY#zWMzwNxQZrBw38ZqM32wJQ
Official PvZ2: Reflourished Discord Server: https://discord.gg/ba9rC7QdKb
PvZ2: Reflourished Dev Team Members: https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/498237462108176388/1030730348595793970/9-1-2022_reflourishedcredits.txt
